description: The number of dispositions issued by local courts for "violation of probation" proceedings during the reporting period.  Categorized by type of disposition: dismissed; probation continued; probation revoked; discharged (probation sentence ended).

name: DOP Juvenile Violations of Probation Disposed by Fiscal Year
